item.description:
"Prometheus" looks like it will be an intense roller coaster ride -- a big, Sci-Fi, visually fun summer blockbuster. Simply can't resist this kind of thing!

Note that this will be a big, big opening of a much-anticipated film. Therefore, YOU SHOULD BUY YOUR TICKETS AHEAD OF TIME to ensure that you get in. Tickets are available now at http://www.fandango.com/.

We'll be attending the 7:30pm IMAX 3D showing. Your hosts will be at the theater by 6:30 at the latest, but possibly closer to 6 to meet attendees. We will move into the INNER LOBBY once a line starts to form. The best chance is to meet us in there. We'll be holding at least one Meetup sign.

ARRIVE EARLY for the best chance of  sitting with the group. You will miss us if you arrive in the 7-7:15 time frame. Again, arrive early for the best chance of sitting with the group. Once inside, we'll look for familiar faces, and we'll try to hold some extra seats for later arrivals.

 

If you miss the group ahead of time, come find us afterwards. We will gather in the hallway outside of the theater in which we saw the movie to discuss the film a bit, allow for restroom breaks and to get a head count of all who would like to go out for drinks and munchies.

Managing the after-event is much easier if everyone brings cash. Please plan ahead if you want to go out with the group to the after-event.

Hope to see you at the movies!

 

Movie Details:

Release Date: June 8, 2012
Studio: 20th Century Fox
Director: Ridley Scott
Screenwriters: Damon Lindelof, Jon Spaihts, Ridley Scott
Starring: Noomi Rapace, Michael Fassbender, Guy Pearce, Idris Elba, Logan Marshall-Green, Charlize Theron
Genre: Sci-Fi
MPAA Rating: Not Available
Official Website: Prometheusmovie.com | WeylandIndustries.com

Plot Summary: Visionary filmmaker Ridley Scott returns to the genre he helped define, creating an original science fiction epic set in the most dangerous corners of the universe. The film takes a team of scientists and explorers on a thrilling journey that will test their physical and mental limits and strand them on a distant world, where they will discover the answers to our most profound questions and to life's ultimate mystery.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be holding a Meetup sign. The IMAX shows are downstairs, so look for us at the ropes near the ticket counter, or inside the INNER lobby.
item.name: Prometheus - IMAX 3D (Please read the full description)
